thread.title: Westwego 15-year-old shot to death after argument
thread.title_full: Westwego 15-year-old shot to death after argument - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: Westwego 15-year-old shot to death after argument
text:
WESTWEGO, LA (WVUE) - Westwego police are investigating the murder 15-year-old boy.
Officers say 15-year-old Kevin Thomas, a student at Higgins High School, was shot in the back after an argument at the Tanglewood Apartment complex in the 1000 block of Sycamore Drive.
According to police, the 15-year-old was outside with three or four other people around 12:15 a.m. on Oct. 19 when gunshots broke out. Investigators say the 15-year-old appeared to be running from the scene when he was shot several times in the back. He managed to make it home, where he pronounced dead.
Police are unsure of the motive, but say narcotics may be involved. Officers found marijuana on the victim and in his room. They also found a stolen firearm in the victim's room.
The shooting is still under investigation. No arrests have been made.
They are asking anyone with information to call the police department at 504-341-5428 or Crimestoppers at 504-822-1111.
